DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate safety efficacy ( 0.02 mg EE betadex clathrate [ β-CDC ] ) / 3 mg drospirenone ( DRSP ) dysmenorrhea . In order appropriately evaluate efficacy EE ( β-CDC ) /DRSP study set placebo-controlled comparative study
DOC.brief_title: To Investigate Efficacy YAZ Treatment Dysmenorrhea
DOC.criteria: Patients suffer dysmenorrhea least previous 3 month prior Visit 1 minimum visual analogue scale ( VAS ) score 30 mm regard pain menstrual period screen period Good general health ( except finding relate dysmenorrhea ) proven medical history Patients age 18 year old time obtain informed consent ; smoker must older 35 year time point inform consent Normal clinically insignificant cervical smear require follow ( cervical smear take screen visit normal result document within previous six month ) . Human papilloma virus ( HPV ) test subject atypical squamous cell undetermined significance ( ASCUS ) use adjunctive test . Subjects ASCUS include negative highrisk HPV strain ( HPV 16 , HPV18 ) . Women childbearing potential must agree adequate contraception use sexually active . This apply sign inform consent form 2 week last study drug administration . Pregnancy ( confirm suspect ) lactation ( less three month since delivery , abortion , lactation start treatment ) Patients wish become pregnant course study Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 32 kg/m2 Hypersensitivity ingredient study drug Laboratory value outside inclusion range randomization Any diseases condition compromise function body system could result altered absorption , excessive accumulation , impaired metabolism , alter excretion study medication Any diseases condition might interfere conduct study interpretation result Any disease condition may worsen hormonal treatment accord assessment opinion investigator .
